title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Renamed and reorganized GitHub Actions tutorial files to a flatter structure (e.g., `building-and-testing-go.md` → `go.md`), updated index files, and added redirects for old URLs.
Added documentation for resetting the root user password for the enterprise management console using `ghe-set-password`.
Created new index files for restructured categories (e.g., `create-actions`).
summary:

- Added documentation for resetting the root user password for the enterprise management console using `ghe-set-password`.
- Created new index files for restructured categories (e.g., `create-actions`).

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Renamed and reorganized GitHub Actions tutorial files to a flatter structure (e.g., `building-and-testing-go.md` → `go.md`), updated index files, and added redirects for old URLs.
- Added documentation for resetting the root user password for the enterprise management console using `ghe-set-password`.
- Created new index files for restructured categories (e.g., `create-actions`).

### Title
Restructure Actions tutorials and add management console password reset
